content: Hi all. Can anyone explain to me how to point to the correct coding system URI for the ACC NCDR coding system? I'm trying to extract different data elements out of an EHR containing references to elements defined in the following data dictionary (https://cvquality.acc.org/docs/default-source/ncdr/cathpci_v5_codersdatadictionary_0402619.pdf?sfvrsn=7df486bf_0). Most of them use snomedct or LOINC coding system where I can refer to the URI Observation.code.coding.system.uri=http://snomed.info/sct or Observation.code.coding.system.uri=http://loinc.org. For the ACC NCDR coding system have no idea which URI to choose. Kind regards Werner
